name: SynthBump
description:
This game is an endless runner where saws come for you, so it may be a BUMPY ride. Enjoy Version 1.1. New versions are coming! Controls: E to Resume, R to Menu, Up and Down Arrows to control the player and thats all! Give me ideas in the comments for new minigames cause I would LOVE reccomendations! So stay tuned!

CURRENT VERSION : v1.2
